description:
The fate of the Far-East Napping Society is in the balance as the club members fight to legitimize its activities. The only way possible to save the club is by taking advantage of the "napping" part of the name to compete athletically with another school. But will so many napping newbies ever manage to measure up to their fiercely dozey competition?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 幻想の...昼寝迷宮[シエスタ・ラビリンス]
